text:
@HumanityForward I'm having a hard time to pay for my rent and medical bills. I am 25 weeks pregnant today and unemployed due to covid19 situation
Im an only daughter so I am responsable gor my mother and father. Overallhaving a hard time. Any contribution is greatly appreciated 🙏
